alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:19PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS CONTINUE TO BE POSSIBLE ACROSS GILA...MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... Conditions remain favorable for isolated strong thunderstorms early this evening across the high terrain of south-central Arizona. Winds in excess of 50 mph will be possible. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Florence, Superior, Gold Canyon, Top Of The World, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Magma, San Tan Valley, Top-Of-The-World, Coolidge Airport, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Superstition Mountains, Kings Ranch, Boyce Thompson Arboretum, and Valley Farms. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior; Tonto Basin
